title: authentication scheme
extract: HTTP Authentication Schemes. The server can specify multiple authentication schemes for the client to choose from. ... Digest authentication is a challenge-response scheme that is intended to replace Basic authentication. The server sends a string of random data called a nonce to the client as a challenge.Mar 29, 2017
extract_html: HTTP Authentication Schemes. The server can specify multiple authentication schemes for the client to choose from. ... Digest authentication is a challenge-response scheme that is intended to replace Basic authentication. The server sends a string of random data called a nonce to the client as a challenge.Mar 29, 2017
